Sentencas: New ceramic gas separators for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were fabricated with a material of 42 mass % MgO-MgAl2O4 (MA) as a base material.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: Thermal and bonding properties of the material were examined.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: The material of the MA has excellent thermal expansion compatibility with the yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte between 100degrees and 1400degreesC. The thermal conductivity of the MA at 25 and 1000degreesC was 16 and 6 Wm(-1) K-1, respectively.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: These values were higher than those of the La0.87Sr0.13CrO3.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: The bonding between the MA blocks was conducted under the condition of 1200degreesC and 12 kPa with a glass as a bonding agent.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: According to scanning electron microscopy and electron probe microanalysis, the bonded interface was dense enough to prevent gases from penetrating.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: Five-cell planar SOFC stacks were fabricated with 120 cm(2) cells and the developed separators.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: Connecting the three stacks electrically in series enabled module to be made where a power generation test was carried out at 1000degreesC with hydrogen gas and air.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs

Sentencas: The developed SOFC module recorded the almost theoretical open-circuit voltage of 15.9 V. It attained the maximum output power of 294 W at a current of 40.4 A and a fuel utilization of 78.6%.
Titulo: Development of ceramic gas separator for SOFCs
